events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System assigned the case to the Refund cluster based on customer's request for money back due to incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your order. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing that I got a completely different item than what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your prompt help. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
We have completed the refund process for your order. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund successfully and that everything else is alright with your order.
Your refund case has been closed. Thank you for contacting customer support. Have a great day!
